Skill Transfers

Front-end Developer

SkillTransfers provides EduTech software solutions to organizations and individuals. Some of my core activities are:

Building Stable and maintainable codebases using React and Redux and creating new features, functionalities and capabilities like(fetch, create, delete, update) around data display and visual dashboards using Redux-Sagas and GraphQL.

Implementing third party libraries ( lodash, Styled Components, i18next, moment, Stripe, React-router, Redux-Sagas, Formik, Yup ).

Skill Transfers

React-Native Developer

I got the responsibility to develop the IOS and Android application for Skill Transfers using React Native to help people follow educational courses. Some of my core activities are:

Implement user authentication, navigation, sign in/out functionality using AWS Amplify, Amazon Cognito and react-navigation.

Working closely with back-end engineer to design and tweak GraphQL queries and Redux Sagas used by the frontend, as well as Maintaining a responsive and adaptive user interface by using the Platform and Dimension API.
